channel.title: BlogTags/Music on Lachies Library
channel.description: Recent content in BlogTags/Music on Lachies Library

item.title: Music Playlists
item.description:
Spotify at the time of writing does not let you share an entire folder, just individual playlists, this blog page is my solution to that with links to all the playlists I wanna share. I’ll link to each playlist and brief description. for playlists that I want to be under a “folder” I will simply put them all under a heading together.

Lachie’s Anthem - Sorted by “vibes”

Lachie’s Anthem Vol.1 - I’m fine , just tired

Description: Slightly higher energy music, good casual gaming vibe Link: https://open.spotify.com/playlist/1cA2dMKPwsxkm2eU5Kjaxc?si=9e325664e80d4ec3
